document_name: National plan on climate change for agriculture (PNCCSA)
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/PAN/2018/PAN-2018-01-07-National plan on climate change for agriculture (PNCCSA)_303598943259de317f40c70897696d46.pdf
document_description: This document aims to increase the agricultural sector's resilience by 2030 and adjust its production processes in order to reduce GHG emissions. It also seeks to adopt a participatory and inclusive approach.
